name: stripemeter
description: Stripe-native usage metering and cost experience platform

scripts.test: pnpm run --filter './packages/*' test && if [ "$E2E_SERVICES" = "1" ]; then pnpm run --filter @stripemeter/api --filter ./apps/workers test; else echo 'Skipping service-dependent tests (set E2E_SERVICES=1 to enable)'; fi
scripts.test:simulator:full: pnpm run test:simulator:unit && pnpm run test:simulator:integration && pnpm run test:simulator:performance
scripts.lint:simulator: echo 'No dedicated linter configured for pricing-lib' && exit 0
scripts.bootstrap: pnpm -r build && pnpm db:migrate && pnpm db:seed
scripts.precommit: pnpm lint && pnpm typecheck && pnpm run test:simulator:fast
